pkgmetadata.longdescription: ================================Django Rest Multiple Model View================================drf-multiple-models provides an easy view (and mixin) for serializing multiple models in a single view. It is built on top of (and meant to be an extension for) Django Rest Framework.Installation------------1. Install the package from pip: .. code-block:: python pip install django-rest-multiple-models2. Make sure to add 'drf_multiple_model' to your INSTALLED_APPS: .. code-block:: python INSTALLED_APPS = ( ... 'drf_multiple_model', )3. Then simply import the view into any views.py in which you'd want to use it: .. code-block:: python from drf_multiple_model.views import MultipleModelAPIViewUsage-----Documentation is on ReadTheDocs:https://django-rest-multiple-models.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
